//   float3 m_vFresnel;                 // Index:    2.xyz            Components:     3 [unused]

//   float2 m_vNormalUvSpeed;           // Index:    4.xy             Components:     2 [unused]

// TEXCOORD                 8   xyz         8     NONE   float   xyz

vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb5[15], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb7[18], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[9], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyzw
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyz
dcl_output o4.xyz
dcl_output o5.xyzw
dcl_output o6.xyzw
dcl_output o7.xyzw
dcl_output o8.xyz
dcl_temps 3
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov r0.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.x, cb4[0].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.y, cb4[1].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.z, cb4[2].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, cb5[7].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb5[8].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.w, cb5[10].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov o0.xyw, r0.xyxw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 62188e172047fa7a-vs.txt
ne r2.w, r0.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r2.w
  add r2.w, r0.w, -r2.y
  mad r0.x, r2.w, r2.x, r0.x
endif

mov o8.xyz, r0.xywx
mov o2.w, r0.w
dp4 o0.z, cb5[9].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov r0.x, v1.w
mov r0.y, v2.w
mul o1.zw, r0.xxxy, cb1[8].xxxy
mov o1.xy, r0.xyxx
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o2.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o3.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
add o4.xyz, r1.xyzx, -cb5[14].xyzx
dp4 r0.x, cb7[9].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb7[10].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mad o5.xy, r0.xyxx, cb7[5].xyxx, cb7[5].zwzz
add r0.xyz, r1.xyzx, -cb7[0].xyzx
dp3 o5.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp4 r0.x, cb7[11].xyzw, r1.xyzw
add o5.z, r0.x, -cb7[4].y
dp4 r0.x, cb7[12].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb7[13].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mad o6.xy, r0.xyxx, cb7[6].xyxx, cb7[6].zwzz
add r0.xyz, r1.xyzx, -cb7[1].xyzx
dp3 o6.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp4 r0.x, cb7[14].xyzw, r1.xyzw
add o6.z, r0.x, -cb7[4].y
dp4 r0.x, cb7[15].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb7[16].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.z, cb7[17].xyzw, r1.xyzw
add r1.xyz, r1.xyzx, -cb7[2].xyzx
dp3 o7.w, r1.xyzx, r1.xyzx
add o7.z, r0.z, -cb7[4].y
mad o7.xy, r0.xyxx, cb7[7].xyxx, cb7[7].zwzz
ret
// Approximately 52 instruction slots used
